title: Replace a leaky funnel with a system that pays for itself
context: Mid-market services brand; leads rose, conversions collapsed.
creative: Rewrote positioning from features to outcomes, simplified the lead capture form.
technical: Rebuilt key pages in React SSG, implemented server-side GA4 events, automated lead routing to sales.

title: Stop shouting. Say one true thing and say it everywhere.
creative: Unified brand story into a single promise, simplified site to three core pages, rewrote onboarding emails to match site promise.
technical: Stripped legacy CSS, implemented a consistent type scale, added simple in-app tour events.

title: Static, fast, reliable.
creative: Designed a cleaner, more readable article template.
technical: Migrated from monolithic CMS to React SSG, optimized images with modern formats, implemented a simple GA4->Sheets ETL pipeline.

title: We shipped a change that hurt. We owned it and recovered.
context: SEO migration missed redirect parity, causing a temporary traffic dip.
creative: Wrote a public, transparent post-mortem explaining the issue and the fix.
technical: Built a parity checklist script, added preflight redirect QA to CI/CD, implemented synthetic monitoring for critical paths.

title: Build a content engine that creates customers
context: B2B tech company with a blog that got traffic but no leads.
creative: Developed 3 core content pillars tied to product value, created templates for case studies and guides, embedded CTAs.
technical: Built a resource hub with filtering, added schema markup for rich snippets.
results: Time on page for key articles +90s

title: Recover 15% of abandoned carts with better emails
context: E-commerce store with a generic, single-step cart abandonment flow.
creative: Wrote a 3-step email sequence: reminder with social proof, objection handling (shipping, returns), and a final small incentive.
technical: Segmented flow based on cart value, A/B tested subject lines using email provider's API.

title: CI/CD pipeline for a marketing site
context: Marketing team relied on manual FTP uploads, causing errors and slow deploys.
creative: Trained marketing team on using git for content changes.
technical: Set up a GitHub Actions pipeline to build the Vite site, run visual regression tests with Percy, and deploy to Netlify.
results: Deploy time from >1 hour to <5 minutes
Production errors from manual uploads eliminated

title: From 10 spreadsheets to one dashboard
context: Management team spent a day a week consolidating reports.
creative: Designed a one-page dashboard focusing on 5 key metrics.
technical: Connected GA4, Google Ads, and CRM data to BigQuery, wrote SQL views to join and clean data, visualized in Looker Studio.
results: Shared view of truth across teams

title: Pricing page redesign lifts demo requests by 40%
context: SaaS company's pricing was confusing and scared users away.
creative: Redesigned page around value metrics instead of feature lists, added a clear FAQ section, included social proof.
technical: A/B tested the new design against the old one using a feature flag system.

title: Healthcare client: $28k revenue from $3.2k ad spend
context: Local healthcare provider needed new patient acquisition at scale.
creative: Developed patient testimonial video ads, wrote benefit-focused copy addressing common pain points, designed landing pages for each service line.
technical: Set up Meta Pixel with server-side conversion tracking, built custom audiences from CRM data, implemented automated lead scoring via Zapier.

title: Win back 18% of dormant subscribers with targeted campaign
context: SaaS company had 12k inactive subscribers who hadn't opened an email in 6+ months.
creative: Created a 4-email reactivation series: feedback request, value reminder, product updates, final farewell with unsubscribe prompt.
technical: Segmented list by last engagement date and account status, set up automated workflow in HubSpot, tracked re-engagement metrics.
results: List health improved with unengaged removed

title: Organic traffic up 240% in 6 months with strategic content
context: B2B service company had minimal organic visibility for high-intent keywords.
creative: Conducted keyword research and competitive gap analysis, created 32 new SEO-optimized pages and blog posts, developed internal linking strategy.
technical: Implemented schema markup for services and FAQs, optimized Core Web Vitals, built XML sitemaps, set up Search Console tracking.

title: Landing page CRO increases conversions from 2.1% to 8.7%
context: High-traffic landing page for paid campaigns had poor conversion rate.
creative: Rewrote headline to focus on core benefit, simplified form from 9 fields to 4, added trust badges and client logos, clarified CTA copy.
technical: Implemented heatmaps and session recordings via Hotjar, ran 3 rounds of A/B tests, improved page load speed by lazy-loading images.

title: Automated lifecycle marketing increases LTV by 34%
context: E-commerce brand had transactional emails only, no nurture sequences.
creative: Mapped customer journey and created 7 automated campaigns: welcome series, educational content, cross-sell, post-purchase, review requests, loyalty program, win-back.
technical: Built workflows in Klaviyo with branching logic based on purchase behavior, integrated with Shopify for real-time data sync, set up cohort analysis tracking.

title: Brand repositioning leads to 3x qualified demo requests
context: B2B SaaS struggled to differentiate from competitors, messaging was generic.
creative: Conducted customer interviews to identify unique value, developed new positioning framework, rewrote homepage and all core pages, created new brand voice guidelines.
technical: Updated site meta descriptions and title tags for SEO, implemented consistent messaging across all touchpoints, trained sales team on new messaging.

title: Migrated marketing site to Webflow, enabling team autonomy
context: Marketing team relied on dev team for every site update, causing bottlenecks.
creative: Designed component-based system with clear CMS structure for case studies and blog posts.
technical: Rebuilt entire site in Webflow with custom interactions, set up CMS collections, integrated with Zapier for form submissions, maintained 301 redirects for SEO.
results: Marketing team can now publish updates same-day

title: Google Ads campaign generates 127 leads at $42 CPL
context: Professional services firm wanted to expand beyond referrals.
creative: Wrote search ads focused on specific pain points, created dedicated landing pages for each service, developed compelling offers (free consultation, guide downloads).
technical: Set up Google Ads with conversion tracking, implemented negative keyword strategy, created remarketing audiences, built automated bid rules.

title: Multi-touch attribution reveals hidden channel value
context: All credit went to last-click, causing underinvestment in awareness channels.
creative: Educated stakeholders on attribution models and presented data story showing full customer journey.
technical: Built custom attribution model in BigQuery pulling data from GA4, ad platforms, and CRM, created Looker Studio dashboard with channel contribution analysis.
results: Discovered social and content drove 40% of pipeline

title: Coordinated product launch generates 1,200 signups in 2 weeks
context: New product feature needed awareness and adoption among existing user base.
creative: Developed launch strategy across email, in-app messaging, blog, and social media, created teaser campaign building anticipation, designed launch day assets.
technical: Set up product analytics to track feature adoption, coordinated email sequences in marketing automation, created in-app tooltips and modals.
results: 45% of target audience activated feature within 30 days
